BluetoothUUID.summary:
The BluetoothUUID interface of the Web Bluetooth API provides a way to look up Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) values by name in the
registry maintained by the Bluetooth SIG.

BluetoothUUIDGetCharacteristic.summary: NOTE Experimental The getCharacteristic() static method of the interface returns a UUID representing a registered characteristic when passed a name or the 16- or 32-bit UUID alias.

BluetoothUUIDGetDescriptor.summary: NOTE Experimental The getDescriptor() static method of the interface returns a UUID representing a registered descriptor when passed a name or the 16- or 32-bit UUID alias.

BluetoothUUIDCanonicalUUID.summary: NOTE Experimental The canonicalUUID() static method of the interface returns the 128-bit UUID when passed a 16- or 32-bit UUID alias.

BluetoothUUIDGetService.summary: NOTE Experimental The getService() static method of the interface returns a UUID representing a registered service when passed a name or the 16- or 32-bit UUID alias.
